Container.Name: Xwiki
Container.Overview: xwiki:mysql-tomcat[br][br] Docker image for Xwiki[br][br] The Advanced Open Source Enterprise Wiki[br][br] This container is provided without the MySQL database container.[br] The MariaDB container is available in my repository as well.[br] [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']DO THIS BEFORE DEPLOYING THE TEMPLATE[br][br] create a /mnt/user/appdata/xwiki directory.[br] create a databse in your MySQL/MariaDB named xwiki [/span][br][br] You can use software such as HeidiSQL to connect to your database instance and create a database and user.[br] Example of DB and user create.[br] create database xwiki;[br] create user 'xwiki' identified by 'xwiki'; grant all on xwiki.* to 'xwiki'; flush privileges; [br][br] unRAID Example to start Xwiki using a MySQL back end:[br] docker run --net=xwiki-nw --name xwiki -p 8080:8080 -v /my/own/xwiki:/usr/local/xwiki -e DB_USER=xwiki -e DB_PASSWORD=xwiki -e DB_DATABASE=xwiki -e DB_HOST=mysql-xwiki xwiki:mysql-tomcat[br][br] [br][br]
